DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the ability of several eye movement monitors, used in clinical practice, to identify children with poor reading eye movements. A second purpose of the study is to evaluate the effectiveness of eye movement therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Eye Movement Testing and Therapy
DOC.criteria: Children ages 8 to 13 with saccadic eye movement deficit Previous saccadic eye movement therapy
